resources.string: Did Martin Luther King Jr. make a speech in Washington DC?
Vermont was the first colony to ban slavery in 1800
In the 1770s, a Quaker named Anthony Benezet created the first school for African American children
William Tucker, son of indentured servants from Great Britian, was the first recorded African child to be born in the colonies in 1620
There was a Black wall street in Tulsa, OK
The first black woman ran for president in, 1969 and was almost assassinated three times
Welcome to the Black History Quiz App
